extension.name: FavGlyph
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavGlyph is a free responsive Joomla! module that uses any icon from Font Awesome and assigns it a short description and a title.
For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavGlyph module.



Copyright © 2012-2015 FavThemes.

field.name: jquery_load
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: Load Joomla! jQuery library. Choose 'No' if your instance loads jQuery from an eternal source.

field.name: layout_effect
field.label: Layout Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the layout on page scroll and load from the 8 preset effects.

field.name: icon_width
field.label: Icon Width
field.description: Choose the width for the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or percent values (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_border_radius
field.label: Icon Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the background of the icon. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_border_type
field.label: Icon Border Type
field.description: Choose the border type of the background of the icon.

field.name: icon_border_width
field.label: Icon Border Width
field.description: Choose the border width for the background of the icon. Please insert the number using pixels (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_google_font
field.label: Title Google Web Font
field.description: Copy the Google Web Font name here, for example Open Sans or Open Sans. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_font_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the title of the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_margin
field.label: Title Margin
field.description: Set the margin for the title of the icon. The margin shorthand property sets all the margin properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left margin. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_description_font_size
field.label: Description Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the description of the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_icon1
field.label: Show Icon 1
field.description: Choose if this icon should be displayed or not.

field.name: icon_layout1
field.label: Icon 1 Layout
field.description: Choose the layout for the icon.

field.name: icon_name1
field.label: Icon 1 Name
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-camera or fa-arrow. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_color1
field.label: Icon 1 Color
field.description: The color for the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_bg_color1
field.label: Icon 1 Background Color
field.description: The color for the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_border_color1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Color
field.description: The color for the border of the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_link1
field.label: Icon 1 Link
field.description: Insert the link for this icon. Note that the link must include http:// (for example: http://favthemes.com/, not favthemes.com). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_link_target1
field.label: Icon 1 Target
field.description: Select the target of the URL.

field.name: icon_font_size1
field.label: Icon 1 Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text1
field.label: Title 1 Text
field.description: Insert text for title

field.name: title_color1
field.label: Title 1 Color
field.description: The color for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_layout1
field.label: Description 1 Layout
field.description: Choose the layout for the description icon.

field.name: description_text1
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, dolore magna aliqua.
field.label: Description 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description in the module.

field.name: description_text_color1
field.label: Description 1 Color
field.description: The color for the description of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.
